name: Finesque_Diamond_Accent_Infinity_Design_Necklace_and_Ring_Set
reviews: Like a lot but pendent smaller than expected
Stone already lost in necklace, worn twice. Chain looks really cheap.
Necklace clasp was broken upon arrival, wore ring and was satisfied.
quality is not the best. the gold band is in top quality
I wear the necklace, but don't usually wear the ring. The ring is very thick, which to me, that means cheap.
What a nice gift idea for Mom or anyone you chose. This set is good quality and made well.
Item is ok but very small stones.
You get what you pay for. For a child, this would be great. The style is good. It just doesn't have much punch.
description:
Make a statement with this beautiful jewelry set by Finesque.
Crafted of gold or silver overlay this infinity design necklace and
ring features sparkling diamond accent.
